**Welcome to my personal website!** I am an Associate Professor of Psychometrics and Quantitative Psychology at [Università degli Studi di Firenze](https://www.unifi.it) in Italy. I have a Ph.D. from [University of Virginia](https://www.virginia.edu) with a specialization in Experimental Psychology and a Laurea (master's degree) from [Università degli Studi di Trieste](https://www.units.it) in Italy, with a specialization in Experimental Psychology. Prior to joining the University of Florence, I was a Postdoctoral Researcher at the [Center for Neural Science](https://as.nyu.edu/cns.html) at [New York University](http://www.nyu.edu), a Postdoctoral Researcher at University of Trieste, and an Associate Professor at University of Trieste.

  `Behavioral \n Research  ` = 0.95,
  `Data \nScience` = 0.85,
  `Scientific \nCommunication` = 0.75,
  `Teaching` = 0.85,
  `Clinical \nPsychology  ` = 0.625,
  `Project  \nManagement` = 0.75,
) |> mutate(ID = row_number(), .before = 1)

skills_radar <- (ggradar::ggradar(
    skills,
    values.radar = NA,
    grid.mid = 0,
    grid.label.size = 0,
    axis.label.size = 4.7,
    group.line.width = 1,
    group.point.size = 3,
    group.colours = "#00AFBB",
    background.circle.colour = NA,
    gridline.mid.colour = "grey",
    gridline.min.linetype = "solid",
    gridline.mid.linetype = "dotted",
    gridline.max.linetype = "longdash",
    fill = TRUE,
    fill.alpha = 0.3
  ) 
  + theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    plot.background = ggplot2::element_rect(fill = "transparent", colour = NA),
    panel.background = ggplot2::element_rect(fill = "transparent", colour = NA),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),
    axis.text.y = element_blank()
  )
)

skills_radar$layers[[1]]$aes_params$colour <- "grey70"
skills_radar$layers[[5]]$aes_params$colour <- "grey70"
skills_radar$layers[[6]]$aes_params$colour <- "grey70"
  
skills_radar
